paragraph.heading: King Christopher I
paragraph.text: His Royal Highness King Christopher I of Brenkrike is an eccentric young man with a penchant for chess, programming and other intellectual pursuits.

paragraph.heading: Queen Miranda I
paragraph.text: Her Royal Highness Queen Miranda I of Brenkrike has not written her bio yet.

paragraph.heading: Princess Emma I
paragraph.text: Princess Emma I is the royal cat. She likes sleeping, eating and cuddles. She also loves hiding under the bath and playing with her ball.
